s-1.ptxt: INSPECT FRONT AIRBAG SENSOR LH (for Vehicle not Involved in Collision)

s2.ptxt: Perform a diagnostic system check (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT FRONT AIRBAG SENSOR LH (for Vehicle Involved in Collision and Airbag not Deployed)

s2.ptxt: Perform a diagnostic system check (See page ).
Visually check the front airbag sensors for defects if the front bumper of the vehicle or the area around the bumper is damaged.

item.ptxt: Cracks or other damage to the connector

atten4.ptxt: If any of the defects is found, replace the front airbag sensor LH with a new one.

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT FRONT AIRBAG SENSOR LH (for Vehicle Involved in Collision and Airbag has Deployed)

s2.ptxt: When airbags have deployed as the result of a collision, be sure to replace all front airbag sensors in the damaged areas (anywhere in need of repair).
Visually check the front airbag sensors in undamaged areas for defects.

item.ptxt: Cracks or other damage to the connector

atten4.ptxt: If any of the defects is found or a front airbag sensor LH has detected a major collision, replace the front airbag sensor LH with a new one.
